name: Project LAMIMASSIASO
description:
Project LAMIMASSIASO is a space shooter. Try to shoot things and get a high score. Enemies spawn in endless waves and you try to kill as many as you can before dying. As you can tell, this idea is super original.

The web version has all the content of the game, but I would still recommend you download it.

Music is by Rik4000.

Mac and Linux builds are untested, but I doubt you'll encounter any problems.

Press 5 to mute the game. Press 4 to go fullscreen. (Currently doesn't work in browser)
